section.title: Checking Query ID References
section.para: When DAO file utilizing Anyframe Query Service refers to not-existent Query ID , red-color error mark is shown on the Query ID of the DAO file.\
As Anyframe Builder of Anyframe Query Manager tracks modification of Query Mapping XML file, when referring to invalid Query ID, error mark is shown, which provides the following benefits to users.

listitem.para: Can check Query IDs which DAO utilizing Anyframe Query Service is referring to are all existent.
Can prevent Runtime error caused by invalid Query ID.
